title: 20 MINS LEAVER BUSTER
body: RIOT!, i had to reset my internet and computer since my ping was sky rocketing of the roof and when i finished the game I GOT A LEAVER BUSTER is this meant to happened when i have to reset?

replies.body:
yes. if it was one time in the last few months then no...

just go do something else for 20 mins lol
